CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Deposits__c <= 10000000, "Under $10 Million", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 10000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 25000000 , "$10 Million up to $25 Million", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 25000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 50000000, "$25 Million up to $50 Million", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 50000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 100000000, "$50 Million up to $100 Million", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 100000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 500000000, "$100 Million up to $500 Million", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 500000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 1000000000, "$500 Million up to $1 Billion", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 1000000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 5000000000, "$1 Billion up to $5 Billion", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 5000000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 20000000000, "$5 Billion up to $20 Billion", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 20000000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 60000000000, "$20 Billion up to $60 Billion", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 60000000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 100000000000, "$60 Billion up to $100 Billion", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 100000000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 150000000000, "$100 Billion up to $150 Billion", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 150000000001 && Total_Deposits__c <= 200000000000,"$150 Billion up to $200 Billion", IF(Total_Deposits__c >= 200000000001, "Over $200 Billion", null )))))))))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula to determine which billing tier a user is on based on their deposit information
CustomField.label: SM Billing Tier
